page.title: 08E V E N T S
page.content:
There is a strong community spirit in the area, although each village has a slightly differing local 'flavour'.
In Stanford,the only village completely within our geographical block, many social gatherings are arranged as fund raising events for the church, including a biennial garden party,a barbecue,a raft race down the Teme and car boot sales. During the winter months regular whist drives are held in the Village Hall and monthly gourmet meals. The Womens' Institute hold their monthly meetings in the Hall. A childrens' party and a luncheon for the elderly are provided at Christmas.
